document_data.name: Lightsinger Theater
document_data.mainbody: '''Lightsinger Theater''' was a theater located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The festhall stood three stories tall.
document_data.Location: Lightsinger Theater was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on the south side of [[Bazaar Street]] where it was joined by the [[Street of Bells]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: A ''[[portal]]'' located in the theater's prop room connected to the sewers in distant [[Ankhapur]].
